oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Enantiospecific synthesis of [7R,6S,5S,4R]-triacetoxy-(-)-goniotriol
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SRIKANTH, GSC
KRISHNA, UM
TRIVEDI, GK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: goniothalamus-giganteus annonaceae
styryl-lactones
(+)-goniofufurone
(+)-goniotriol
goniofufurone
styryllactones
goniotriol
ring closing metathesis
pcc oxidation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A short and efficient synthesis of [7R,6S,5S,4R]-triacetoxy-(-)-goniotriol starting form D-glucose is described. A sequence of ring closing metathesis (RCM) followed by a PCC oxidation was used to construct the core six-membered alpha,beta-unsaturated lactone moiety. (C) 2002 . .
